article_title: Worst Lottery To Win Is IRS Audit Lottery, So Decrease Your Odds

article_metadata.description: Tax audits are miserable, whether in person or by correspondence. Lower IRS audit rates are emboldening some taxpayers, so be careful.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
